mapper.select:
select discoveryId, name, description, publishTime, tags, imageURL, type, author, url, isRec from m_discovery where 1=1
and type = #{type} and name like '%${name}%' and description like '%${description}%'
order by publishTime desc

select count(discoveryId) from m_discovery where isRec = 'true'
and type = #{discoveryType}

select discoveryId, name, description, publishTime, tags, imageURL, type, author, url, isRec from m_discovery where 1=1
and type = #{type}
select discoveryTypeId, name, type from m_discovery_type order by sort
select advImageId, imageURL, enable, url from m_adv_image
mapper.insert: insert into m_discovery( discoveryId, name, description, publishTime, tags, imageURL, type, author, url, isRec ) values( #{discoveryId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{publishTime}, #{tags}, #{imageURL}, #{type}, #{author}, #{url}, #{isRec} )
